May 6 — Fireside Chat with Amos Bar-Joseph — The Autonomous Business OS (Panel Summary):
Discussed the end of “growth at all costs” and the rise of the autonomous business operating system, where efficiency and AI augmentation are core. Emphasized the shift from scaling by headcount to scaling by intelligence. Highlighted the importance of human-AI collaboration: using AI to multiply the impact of top human talent, not just to replace jobs.
May 6 — Fireside Chat with Jon Miller & Omer Gotlieb — The AI Mixologist (Panel Summary):
Used cocktail-making as a metaphor for marketing and personalization in the AI era. Explained that successful personalization involves choosing the right offer, timing, channel, and content. Argued that AI should enable scalable, context-aware personalization and that “reasoning AI” will outperform rule-based engines. Warned that trust and authenticity are essential for AI-driven interactions.
May 6 — Fireside Chat with Elias Torres — What Comes After The CRM (Panel Summary):
Explored how CRM systems must evolve beyond data management to enable true relationship-building. Advocated for unifying customer data and focusing on high-quality, personalized experiences, akin to luxury hospitality. Stressed that the future of CRM is human-centric: systems should remind, suggest, and enable meaningful action, not just store information.
May 6 — Executive Roundtable — 11x or 0x? What it really takes to make agentic AI work (Panel Summary):
Senior executives discussed the cultural and organizational shifts required to succeed with agentic AI. Topics included change management, aligning incentives, and building trust in AI systems.
May 6 — Executive Roundtable — Agentic Marketing (Panel Summary):
Examined how agentic AI is transforming marketing strategies. Discussed new approaches to segmentation, automation, and real-time engagement.

Fullcast is the RevOps platform that bridges the gap between go-to-market planning and execution. By integrating territories, quotas, and capacity planning into a single, AI-enabled system, it ensures your strategies are always aligned and adaptable. Say goodbye to spreadsheets and hello to seamless scalability.
Bounti transforms traditional sales incentives into dynamic, agent-driven experiences that automatically adapt to real-time performance and market shifts. Instead of static commission structures, Bounti leverages intelligent agents to optimize rewards, align revenue behaviors, and maximize sales team motivation. It’s not just incentives—it’s agentic revenue acceleration.
Regie is the AI-powered prospecting platform that brings agentic intelligence to your sales outreach—unifying email, social, and calls into one seamless, hyper-personalized system. By leveraging dynamic agent-driven prompts and enriched data insights, Regie enables sales teams to prioritize leads, increase engagement, and accelerate pipeline growth. Welcome to the future of prospecting: fully agentic, continuously optimized, always personalized.
Gainsight, the leading Customer Success platform, drives growth by unifying the post-sales journey with tools for success, education, product experience, and community. Used by nearly 200 public companies, Gainsight powers acquisition, retention, and expansion. Learn more about top users like GE Digital and Workday.
Vivun is the leading provider of Technical Sales solutions, which includes the world’s first AI Sales Engineer, and is fully dedicated to helping companies use AI to scale technical expertise, build better products, and run better operations. Customers like ADP, Coupa, Docusign, Elastic, Seismic, and Snowflake leverage Vivun solutions to win more deals faster, with a lower cost of sale.
Explorium revolutionizes how GTM teams access external data by automating discovery, enrichment, and integration through agentic AI. Instead of manual data wrangling, Explorium’s intelligent agents autonomously identify critical signals, surface actionable insights, and seamlessly feed your go-to-market motions. Elevate decision-making, eliminate guesswork, and empower GTM strategies with Explorium’s agent-driven data advantage.
Navu is the AI companion that transforms your B2B website into a dynamic, conversion-driving experience. It guides visitors in real-time, delivering personalized insights and boosting engagement without the need for a complete overhaul. Think of it as your digital concierge, turning passive browsing into active buying.
FunnelStory is your AI-powered revenue guardian, proactively identifying and mitigating churn risks before they impact your bottom line. By analyzing usage patterns, conversations, and business intelligence, it offers a unified model to detect and address potential customer attrition. With FunnelStory, you can act decisively on early warning signs, safeguarding revenue and staying ahead of the competition.
Ask-AI empowers your team with no-code AI assistants that seamlessly integrate with your company data. These assistants enhance employee productivity and elevate customer experiences by providing instant, intelligent responses. It’s like having a knowledgeable colleague available 24/7, ready to assist with any query.
Vidyard revolutionizes business communication with its comprehensive video platform, enabling personalized video messaging at scale. From prospecting to closing deals, Vidyard’s AI-driven tools help you connect with audiences more effectively, turning viewers into customers. It’s not just video; it’s your new sales superpower.
Common Room is an AI-powered customer intelligence platform that unifies signals across channels, providing actionable insights to enhance go-to-market strategies.
Momentum is the AI-native revenue orchestration platform that transforms every customer interaction into structured, actionable GTM data—automating workflows, surfacing insights, and driving predictable revenue. It seamlessly integrates with your existing tools like Salesforce and Slack, ensuring your team stays focused on selling while Momentum handles the admin. Think of it as your always-on GTM co-pilot, turning conversations into conversions.
Amoeba is your AI-powered data scientist, transforming complex data into clear, actionable insights. Utilizing advanced AI technologies, it automates the journey from data collection to decision-making, empowering your go-to-market teams to focus on growth. With Amoeba, data-driven decisions become second nature.
Fullcast is the RevOps platform that bridges the gap between go-to-market planning and execution. By integrating territories, quotas, and capacity planning into a single, AI-enabled system, it ensures your strategies are always aligned and adaptable. Say goodbye to spreadsheets and hello to seamless scalability.
Aviso is your AI-guided revenue platform, delivering predictive analytics and conversational intelligence to supercharge your sales efforts. With over 20 patents in AI technology, it provides precise forecasting and actionable insights, helping you close deals faster and more effectively. Aviso doesn’t just predict the future; it helps you shape it.

Event Overview
AI-native GTM, Business Models, and Scale
Gone are the days of bloated headcounts; agentic AI empowers hyper-lean teams to surge toward $100M ARR. This summit is your front-row seat to the dawn of AI-native GTM, led by visionary CXOs, analysts, and VCs who reveal how to innovate in an era where compute investments overshadow headcount, while outdated strategies and processes meet their AI-native replacements—spanning business models, fundraising, leadership, and beyond.

the experts
Explore how industry leaders are shifting from augmenting existing models to building AI-native GTM strategies from the ground up.

Marketing, CS, and RevOps.

guidance

What to Expect
Agenda
Join exclusive executive roundtables and fireside chats with GTM leaders, delivering AI-driven strategies to transform how top companies lead and win in 2025.

9:30 am PT
Fireside Chat
Fireside Chat with Amos Bar-Joseph —
The Autonomous Business OS 
(The Death of the Unicorn Playbook)
How Swan AI is scaling to 30 million ARR with three founders, more than 30 agents, and no sales team.
Why lean, AI native companies are outperforming headcount heavy organizations in speed and margin.
Inside the new GTM OS: more than one million ARR per employee and decision velocity as the key metric.

                                          Product

It’s not just incentives—it’s agentic revenue acceleration.

                                                      Read transcript
                                          Product
Regie is the AI-powered prospecting platform that brings agentic intelligence to your sales outreach—unifying email, social, and calls into one seamless, hyper-personalized system. By leveraging dynamic agent-driven prompts and enriched data insights, Regie enables sales teams to prioritize leads, increase engagement, and accelerate pipeline growth. Welcome to the future of prospecting: fully agentic, continuously optimized, always personalized.

Who’s attending
What our attendees say
Sr. Director of Product Marketing
Staci Ziccardi 
“I was curious, so I quickly signed up for the first session, then canceled my plans and stayed all day for the rest. Incredible speakers, insights, and takeaways from Hard Skill Exchange”
Sales Growth Expert, Founder, CEO, Blue SalesFly
Michael Koory
“Outstanding event! HSE leads the way, setting the bar extremely high for value-added content and conversations. Great series”
Vice President of Sales, Salesvue
Adam Thomas
“Enjoyed the sessions during the Hard Skill Exchange AI Summit today.
One of the sessions focused on leveraging AI in outbound prospecting efforts.
A few takeaways…
80% of the buyer journey happens before they even speak with a seller.
People are intentionally writing emails to not look like AI even if they’re using AI to find and target them.
It’s next to impossible to get someone in market when they are not already shopping for a solution (At least for a purchase within next 12 months).
Use #AI and data to find those in market and (3% or less are in market at a given time) FOCUS efforts there.
Most companies are using the same signals like job changes so in order to stand out blend 1st party data along with these signals you and everyone else are capturing”
Service Sales, Volvo Construction Equipment & Services
Brandon Hooper 
“Fresh from watching the AI-Led Growth Summit, and once again, the team at Hard Skill Exchange is dropping gold. Massive thanks for hosting a space where innovation, insight, and execution collide. This wasn’t just another panel, it was a masterclass in where AI is taking us next in GTM and sales”
Research Director, Forrester
Seth Marrs
“The best part of my job is getting to speak to the smartest people in the sales tech market. I had the opportunity to do this yesterday at the Hard Skill Exchange #AISummit. We talked about AI in qualification. Here are a few comments that stood out from the conversation.
People and AI together is where things are going. Anyone who says they can replace your BDR/SDR is overselling AI and their product;
Only replace your BDR/SDR with AI if you are ok with burning your TAM to the ground;
The BDR/SDR of the future will require a much higher skill level than they do now;
AI will let buyers get more value from the qualification process;
The current version of BDR/SDR processes leads to so much spam. I wish I could declare email bankruptcy to make it stop. It keeps me from catching opportunities I may really value”
Consulting Sales Director, Smartz Consulting
John Smartz
“Sitting in on all the sessions at the AI Summit. Shockingly, they are allowing it to be free. It’s been massively helpful”
Evangelist, ThriveStack
Peter Wheeler
“HSE has once again proven it is the place where top minds in business, entrepreneurship, and go to market strategy convene and freely share best practices and innovative ideologies”
Chief Marketing Officer, SoftwareReviews
Christina Kearney
“Day 1 of the AI Summit for B2B hosted by Hard Skill Exchange sparked some thought-provoking conversations. Here are a few things to consider:
AI’s potential goes beyond efficiency—it’s time to focus on how AI can drive effectiveness in marketing and sales.
In AI-driven prospecting, less is more—accuracy should be prioritized over volume.
Context is king: AI can equip GTM teams with the right information at the right time, improving the buyer experience.
With 80–90% of the sales process happening before a conversation with Sales, salespeople must evolve into buyer enablers.
What are your key takeaways from adjusting your GTM strategy in response to AI advancements?”
